s.text: Being a much more eloquent and mature woman yourself, do you think you could explain "Immature Woman Syndrome" to me so that I can understand the many wonderful, but immature young women I know?
Being a much more eloquent and mature woman yourself, do you think you could explain "Immature Woman Syndrome" to me so that I can understand the many wonderful, but immature young women I know?
Being a much more eloquent and mature woman yourself, do you think you could explain "Immature Woman Syndrome" to me so that I can understand the many wonderful, but immature young women I know?
Good luck in your mission to help your nieces--and your sister.
There are 2,300 chapters, so chances are good she's near one.
